sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from '../../components/Navbar' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Footer from '../../components/Footer'; import { useStoreState } from 'easy-peasy'; const CustomerInvoices = () => { const [invoices, setInvoices] = useState(null); const [customer, setCustomer] = useState(null); const userLanguage = useStoreState((state) => state.userLanguage); const [writingDirection, setWritingDirection] = useState("ltr"); return ( <>
Customer {`${customer.name} ${customer.surname}`}

{`All Invoices for ${customer.name} ${customer.surname}`}

{invoices && invoices.length > 0 ? invoices.map((invoice, index) => (

Name: {new Date(invoice.date).toLocaleDateString("en-US", {month: "long", day: "numeric", year: "numeric"})}

Payment Status{invoice.payment_status}

{/*

Membership {customer.membership_status === "VIP" ? "VIP" : "Basic" }

*/} View
)) : (

This customer has no invoices.

) }
) } export default CustomerInvoices
